name: Lance Bangs
bio:
Lance Bangs is a filmmaker, documentarian, and music video director.

His comedy work includes directing David Cross's film Let America Laugh, as well as standup specials for Marc Maron, John Hodgman, Nick Thune, Todd Barry and Rob Delaney. Bangs has also been heavily involved in the filming and production of MTVâ€™s Jackass television series and its subsequent movies. He Executive Produces the current adultswim series Loiter Squad and recently directed The Greatest Event in Television History with Adam Scott.

He will be directing the new Comedy Central series Meltdown with Jonah Ray and Kumail Nanjiani.
